source.42293d43: This Exploratory data analysis will delve into the different airbnb listings and what kind of insights can be derived from them. In particular, there is particular interest in looking at how each of the specific regions (column neighbourhood_groups) differ, in terms of ratings, stays, and price. A correlation analysis between price and number of reviews is also explroed as well.
